timeline.message: Update CI badge in README.md after #3378
Fix permissions issue with Coveralls token

Run jobs for Java 8 and 14.

Temporarily re-hook the workflow to the pull_request event to test the setup.
Publish coverage for master builds too

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure "Java CI" is clearer than "Build Status", but I guess I don't feel that strongly about it.
timeline.author: tfmorris
